case.title: Are you funny or fun to talk with, call me! - 31 (NY)
case.text: Like the phone? Why not use it to give a ring to a slim, white, "normal" guy with dark hair and eyes. I only ask that you're slim as well and under 35. Pick these #'s out this7 is1 a8 fun3 game5 did4 you8 figure3 it6 out6 Ok, so give it a shot and call me to say hi!
